transcript:
Customer: Hello
Hello
Executive: Haanji sir aapne kya karo sir abhi aap bata rahe ho ki waha par aapko option mil nahi pa raha hai.
Customer: Mobile app mein.
Executive: Hello PNS setting mein toh aisa kuch aa nahi raha hai sir.
Ek kaam karenge woh jo maine aapko last time option bataya tha jisse aap mujhe apni screen share kar sakte hain. Screen share karenge ek baar aap.
Customer: Woh three lines pe click karke then customer support mein jaake account manager.
Executive: Aayega sir?
Customer: Haan sir screen show ho rahi hai aap kya kaam karein ek baar settings mein jaayein.
Executive: Yeh aa gaya sir setting mein.
Customer: PNS settings mein jaayein sir upar jo upar aa rahi thi na.
Executive: PNS setting chalu kar di sir.
Customer: Haan sir scroll down karenge haan.
Executive: Wapis se sir upar kijiye ek baar you will receive all buyers calls from IndiaMART buyers number.
Customer: Sir upar karenge wapis.
Executive: Haan I think sir woh jo three dots aa rahe hain ek baar us pe click.
Customer: Laptop kyun?
Executive: Actually sir yeh na main aapko batau yeh yaha se toh hamare paas option mobile app mein hai nahi.
Yeh aapke laptop se hi karna padega sir.
Customer: Yeh notification setting mein toh nahi aayega sir?
Executive: Notification settings mein promotion communication sir promotion communication mein jaana hai ek baar.
Sir promotion communication mein jaana hai ek baar.
Customer: Haan
Executive: Sir yaha par aapko woh option mil nahi raha hai na hi mere khayal mein yaha par woh option hai.
Preferred number setting bhi theek hai sab kuch theek hai isme. Notification ringtone theek hai.
Executive: Woh hume na sir laptop se hi karna padega.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Isme sir problem kya aa raha hai ki aapko foreign se aapka ab jo plan hai sir woh domestic plan hai isme aapko sirf Indian customers hi call kar sakte hain jo India mein rehte hain.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Humne isme option kya kar diya hai ki aapko foreign se bhi call aa jaye jiski wajah se na sir calls aapko saari nahi aa pa rahi hain problem aa raha hai iski wajah se.
Customer: Aha.
Executive: Toh yeh setting ko off karana padega.
Customer: Dusre ko karein?
Executive: Iska ho sakta hai woh dikkat aa rahi hai sir main.
Customer: Haan woh mere khayal mein sir isi wajah se ho rahi hai pehle sir humko yeh wala option band karna padega then jaise hi option band karenge hum aap turant apne PNS number pe call karke dekhna ki kis number pe ja rahi hai woh.
Executive: Theek hai na sir.
Chaliye sir main aapko sir yeh bataiye ki kitna time lagega sir aapko office pahuchne mein?
Customer: Main ab 10:30 baje tak ki koshish karta hu pahuchne ki office.
Executive: Haan sir agar aap thoda jaldi pahuch jaaye toh thoda achha rahega waise baki ek baar mujhe kuch time bata sakte hain sir ki 1:00 baje tak pahuchenge aap kitne baje tak?
Customer: Main sir 11:00 se 12:00 ke beech mein pahuch jaunga main.
Executive: Achha abhi 10:30 baj raha hai 11:00 se 12:00 ke beech mein pahuch jaunga sir.
Theek hai sir toh woh toh aur achha rahega sir.
Customer: Ji sir.
Executive: Theek hai sir toh main aapko 11:30 pe call karta hu sir.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay thank you.
Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving calls.

- Customer unable to find option in mobile app.



Resolution:

- Executive checked customer's settings via screen share.

- Executive informed the issue is due to domestic plan.

- Executive informed to visit office to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call customer at 11:30 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, pns settings, domestic plan, screen share
